http

Class RequestHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • http.RequestHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class RequestHandler
extends java.lang.Thread
    RequestHandler is the class that wait the Request from the client and then build and send the corresponding Response
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Tristan Bourvon, Marc-Antoine FERNANDES

    • Nested Class Summary

        private Response handleRequest(Request req)
        This function is called when a request is well formed. It create a Response depending on the req
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        complete Response (excepts server defaults headers)

      • getStaticFile

        private java.nio.file.Path getStaticFile(java.lang.String path)
        Search the file and check if it's in WWW_FOLDER. If it is, return the canonical path, Otherwise, return null
        Parameters:

        Returns:
